第74届柏林国际电影节(2024)
　　遇见单元 最佳影片 本·拉塞尔 / 纪尧姆·卡约
　　最佳纪录片奖 特别荣誉 本·拉塞尔 / 纪尧姆·卡约
　　最佳纪录片奖 金熊奖(提名) 本·拉塞尔 / 纪尧姆·卡约
introduction: Direct Action documents the everyday of one of the most important activist communities in France in order to see how the success of a radical protest movement can offer a path through the climate crisis facing us all.Following the principles of Jean Rouch’s ethnographic filmmaking and Wiseman’s immersive approach, Direct Action is a unique and hypnotic portrayal of a community which is not circumscribed to its violent interactions with the State: thanks to their meticulous observation, the directors document a highly singular political movement where it is still possible to conceive a better tomorrow.
